description: Edexcel plc (non-executive); educational services.  Address: 190 High Holborn, London, WC1V 7EH. Edexcel bought a work experience charity, Trident Trust, of which I was a trustee. My role was to oversee the work of Trident within Edexcel. I attend four meetings a year. Terminated May 2010.
Fees from appearances on The Wright Stuff (Channel 5). (Up to £5,000). Terminated May 2010.
